p:
Syringes were also shared when PWID bought premeasured syringes from drug dealers. PWID did not know whether these were clean or used syringes and reported returning syringes to dealers after injecting.
Interviewer: Tell me where you obtain needles or syringes to inject your drugs?
Participant 28: I obtained needle and syringe from a drug seller. He gave me already mixed drug. I did not take part in mixing the drug. And after him injecting me, the used ones were taken by him. (27-year-old woman, used to but no longer injects)
